private String renderStream(JSONObject response) {
    try {
        JSONArray posts = response.getJSONArray("data");
        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
        String[] chunks = { "<html><head>", "<link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"file:///android_asset/stream.css\" type=\"text/css\">", "</head><body>" };
        appendAll(sb, chunks);
        for (int i = 6; i < posts.length(); i++) {
            renderPost(posts.getJSONObject(i), sb);
        }
        sb.append("</body></html>");
        return sb.toString();
    } catch (JSONException e) {
        // TODO Auto-generated catch block
        e.printStackTrace();
        return "";
    }
}||||||||private String renderStream(JSONObject response) {
    try {
        JSONArray posts = response.getJSONArray("data");
        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
        String[] chunks = { "<html><head>", "<link rel=\"stylesheet\" href=\"file:///android_asset/stream.css\" type=\"text/css\">", "</head><body>" };
        appendAll(sb, chunks);
        for (int i = 6; i < posts.length(); i++) {
            renderPost(sb, posts.getJSONObject(i));
        }
        sb.append("</body></html>");
        return sb.toString();
    } catch (JSONException e) {
        // TODO Auto-generated catch block
        e.printStackTrace();
        return "";
    }
